The claim was published on Facebook on M: 2020, and has been shared more than 21,000 times.
The claim states that Thailand is ranked: 19 fight category based on the Global Health Security Index (GHS Index).
The GHS Index: published in October 2019, ranks Thailand as the highest ranking Asian country and the 6th most prepared country worldwide for an infectious disease outbreak.
The GHS Index does not rank countries in: COVID-19 fight category," and the claim of Thailand having the lowest number of infected cases is false, as several other regional countries have lower levels of confirmed infections.
